title: Does law prohibit or invalidate child or early marriage?
subtitle: Binary (Yes/No) variable measuring whether there are provisions that prevent the marriage of girls, boys, or both before they reach the legal age of marriage or the age of marriage with consent, including, for example, a prohibition on registering the marriage or provisions stating that such a marriage is null and void.

dimensions.displayName: Does law prohibit or invalidate child or early marriage?
